page.shortlink: api client api a5 u array object from method

argument.name: properties
argument.description: The array of property names to use from the object.

page.description: Convert an object into an array.

discussion.p: The A5.u.array.object.from method can convert an object into an array. The array will have the objects values output in the order the properties are listed. Missing values will be output as null.
